# Function name: paste0
# Notes:
#.blue[`paste0()`]
.center[.blue[`paste0`]`(*things*)`]
.small[
+ It pastes together character strings without adding spaces. 
+ The .blue[`paste0()`] function prints a slash before quotes.
.pull-left[
```{r, comment=""}
paste0("The cyberman", " cried.")
paste0('The cyberman said "error."')
words <- "Hi Mom"
paste0("Ray said ", '"', words, '".')
```
]
.pull-right[
+ The .blue[`paste()`] function puts a space between words.
+ The .blue[`glue::glue()`] function is an excellent alternative.
```{r, comment=""}
words <- "Hi Mom"
glue::glue('Ray said "{words}".')
```
]
]
